body: +foxes is lovely and I wish I had pictures of foxes to contribute. I was thinking yesterday that I needed more cute animal pictures in my life and this morning my wish was granted! :)
body_html: +foxes is lovely and I wish I had pictures of foxes to contribute. I was thinking yesterday that I needed more cute animal pictures in my life and this morning my wish was granted! :)
title: Shout out to @foxite for flooding my front page with cute foxes!

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Seconded. I wasn't expecting such an active poster, especially immediately after the guild was created and doesn't even have 100 subscribers yet.
body_html: Seconded. I wasn't expecting such an active poster, especially immediately after the guild was created and doesn't even have 100 subscribers yet.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs
